Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the hosted zone ID, such as Z23ABC4XYZL05B.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The ID that Amazon Route 53 assigned to the hosted zone when you created it.
Returns the set of name servers for the specific hosted zone. For example: ns1.example.com. This attribute is not supported for private hosted zones.
